CustomField.formula: CASE(Model__c, "GPA", CASE(GPA_Country_short_name__c, "DO", GPA_Admin_area_level_1_short_name__c, "VE", GPA_Admin_area_level_1_short_name__c, "DE", GPA_Admin_area_level_1_short_name__c, "KR", GPA_Admin_area_level_1_short_name__c, "AT", GPA_Admin_area_level_1_short_name__c, "HU", GPA_Admin_area_level_1_short_name__c, "SE", GPA_Admin_area_level_1_short_name__c, "UY", GPA_Admin_area_level_1_short_name__c, "" ), "XAL", CASE(CountryCode__c, "PA", AdministrativeAreaCode__c, "PY", AdministrativeAreaCode__c, "BO", AdministrativeAreaCode__c, "HK", AdministrativeAreaCode__c, "AR", AdministrativeAreaCode__c, "CL", AdministrativeAreaCode__c, "" ), /* at this time XAL model does not include state or province except PA,PY and BO */ "")
CustomField.label: Global State/Province code
